value.title: UPDATE 1-Taiwan readies plans to stabilise stock market amid virus fears
value.excerpt: Taiwan’s financial authority said on Wednesday it had readied a plan to stabilise the island’s stock market and was looking at banning short-selling of stocks under certain circumstances. The regulator’s plan comes days after its main equities board saw record foreign capital outflows in the face of worries about the impact of the coronavirus outbreak.
